titleStmt.title: The wicked mans plot defeated, or, The wicked man laughed out of countenance as it was represented in a sermon preached in St. Mary Wool-Church, London, May 11, 1656, by Thomas Baker.
titleStmt.author: Baker, Thomas, Rector of St. Mary the More.
Baker, Thomas, Rector of St. Mary the More. Gods provenance asserted in another sermon preached at St. Buttolphs, Aldergate, London.
Baker, Thomas, Rector of St. Mary the More. Christs comming to judgement deciphered in a third sermon.

notesStmt.note: With: Gods provenance asserted in another sermon preached at St. Buttolphs, Aldersgate, London : near about the same time as the former / and by the same authour. Christs coming to judgement deciphered in a third sermon preached at Lincolnes-Inn / by the same author.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
